abstract: Merck and Schering-Plough said Thursday they have won merger approval from the Federal Trade Commission and antitrust regulators in Switzerland and Canada.
snippet: Merck and Schering-Plough said Thursday they have won merger approval from the Federal Trade Commission and antitrust regulators in Switzerland and Canada.
